channel.title: Stuff.co.nz - Stuff
channel.description: Top Stories from Stuff.co.nz. New Zealand, world, sport, business & entertainment news on Stuff.co.nz.

item.title: One person seriously injured after road crash in Christchurch
item.description: Motorists urged to stay away from the site of a two vehicle collision after one person was seriously injured.
item.dc:creator: NADINE PORTER

item.title: Covid-19: Why I changed my mind about getting vaccinated
item.description: OPINION: For six months I’ve coughed, had blue lips and shortness of breath. I knew that if I was having such a hard time with a small virus, then I was going to really suffer if I caught Covid.
item.dc:creator: STUFF NATION CONTRIBUTORS

item.title: Courtney Duncan powers closer to third successive world championship title
item.description: Kiwi motocross star enjoys successful weekend in Spain to extend her lead heading into series finale.
item.dc:creator: STUFF SPORTS REPORTERS

item.title: Covid-19 vaccine: Super Saturday smashed national, Auckland, Māori vax records
item.description: Everything you need to know about New Zealand's Covid-19 vaccine programme, including details on when you can expect your jab.
item.dc:creator: HANNAH MARTIN

item.title: Covid-19: Getting vaccinated is an act of love - and it will save lives
item.description: OPINION: After going blind because I was not inoculated against measles as a child, I feel lucky and honoured to be able to get a Covid-19 vaccination that is free and safe.
item.dc:creator: OLIVIA AWHI

item.title: Black Caps edge Netherlands for Twenty20 World Cup warm-up win
item.description: With just 11 players to pick from, New Zealand prevail by six runs in very hot conditions in Dubai, as former skipper Stephen Fleming lends a coaching hand.
item.dc:creator: STUFF SPORTS REPORTERS

item.title: Succession: TV's darkest comedy is finally back - and the wait has been worth it
item.description: REVIEW: Come for the witty one-liners and acerbic put-downs delivered by this excellent ensemble, stay for the fabulous narrative twists and turns.
item.dc:creator: JAMES CROOT

item.title: The French Connection: Why it always reminds me of my second home in New York
item.description: REVIEW: This film helped to clear a path for a generation of smart, gritty, literate and uncompromising dramas to get made – and to get seen.
item.dc:creator: GRAEME TUCKETT

item.title: Warehouse Precinct: Eat your way around Dunedin's New York-style foodie district
item.description: It's home to everything from boutique bakeries and microbreweries to burger joints and fine-dining spots.
item.dc:creator: SIOBHAN DOWNES

item.title: New Zealand's thirst city: A guide to Dunedin's breweries
item.description: Wellington might be known as the craft beer capital, but Dunedin was brewing before it was cool.
item.dc:creator: SIOBHAN DOWNES

item.title: The Dirt: Dunedin City councillor Sophie Barker's garden escape
item.description: Sophie Barker grew up in Larnach Castle, famed for its gardens and remains a keen gardener.
item.dc:creator: AS TOLD TO EMILY SIMPSON

item.title: Room review: EBB-Dunedin strikes a balance between cool, comfortable and decadent
item.description: You’re unlikely to miss this new hotel — it's a literal work of art.
item.dc:creator: JOSIE STEENHART

item.title: Motivation to change: A basketball coach's mission to support Pasifika dads
item.description: Peter Josephs grew up without a dad, but his grandpa filled that role for him. Now, he wants to support Pasifika men to be better fathers.
item.dc:creator: TORIKA TOKALAU

item.title: Dunedin: A side of the city you've never seen
item.description: From a butterfly forest to $20 island getaway, we go on the hunt for the region's best secret spots.
item.dc:creator: BROOK SABIN

item.title: New Zealand's best pastry is hidden in a small South Island town
item.description: Tucked away in a small South Island town you'll find a diet-defying delicious treat.
item.dc:creator: BROOK SABIN

item.title: St Clair Hot Salt Water Pool: NZ's version of Bondi Beach
item.description: Luxuriating in this ocean-side pool while watching a storm roll in is Dunedin's version of heaven.
item.dc:creator: BROOK SABIN

item.title: Covid is terrifying for the immunocompromised. Please get vaccinated to protect us
item.description: OPINION: Covid is terrifying for those of us with weakened immune systems, writes Golriz Ghahraman. Please get vaccinated to protect us.
item.dc:creator: GOLRIZ GHAHRAMAN

item.title: Hana Pera Aoake on the end of the world, and gender
item.description: With climate change, the pandemic, and vast inequalities across societies, Hana Pera Aoake wondered whether to bring a child into the world.
item.dc:creator: KELLY DENNETT

item.title: Quiz: Kids trivia challenge: October 17, 2021
item.description: Where is the Grand Canyon?
item.dc:creator: SHAHRA HUME

item.title: How many times must I ask you to get vaccinated? Quite a few, it seems
item.description: OPINION: Vaxathon shows how far New Zealand has come since 1975, when Telethon started.
item.dc:creator: KEVIN NORQUAY
